name: order-molly
description: "Ordering" app to forefront value of work and workers in the current economy

scripts.build:scripts:app: browserify $npm_package_config_externalargs --debug -p [ minifyify --map app.min.js.map --output js/app.min.js.map ] -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] --standalone FarmersMarkets js/src/app.js > js/app.min.js
scripts.build:scripts: npm run build:scripts:vendor && npm run build:scripts:app
scripts.watch:scripts:app: watchify $npm_package_config_eternalargs --debug -p [ minifyify --map app.min.js.map --output js/app.min.js.map ] -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] --standalone FarmersMarkets --outfile js/app.min.js js/src/app.js

author: Geoff Hing <geoffhing@gmail.com>
